response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, representing years of innovation and dedication. Given its significance, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this product at an exceptional price of $950,000. This offer not only represents a significant saving but also ensures that you secure a piece that is highly sought after and could appreciate in value over time.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that you will find the product to be an excellent investment and a testament to quality and craftsmanship.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
